title: The Guardian
description: "Fate has a way of stepping in when you least expect it." Rhiannon has been hidden most of her life and protected from the terrible tragedy that stole her parent's lives when she was only a child. Raised in a normal human society, she thinks her life will never change. And then strange things start happening, and someone or something seems to be watching her every move... Fate has a way of intervening when she is confronted by true evil, her existence threatened by an entirely new and foreign entity, one that is as mysterious as the man who suddenly enters her life. A stranger that makes her question her reality and an unimaginable fate she is destined to follow, Kellen's motives are as strange as his appearance.  Now Rhiannon must seek the truth as a dark and deadly enemy pursues hunting her, but the only protection she has is....The Guardian. Can she trust in Kellen when her life is on the line?Is the Light strong enough to defeat the Darkness, even if it seeks your soul?
author: Nikki Landis
